page.title: 16SHOPPING
page.content: We asked people where they bought odd items of food,their main food shopping ,clothes and large electrical goods. Most people buy their odd items of food in Holmfirth (5km away). Nearly as many buy them from the village shop in Hepworth.A few people shop in Jackson Bridge and Scholes. Most people do their main food shopping at supermarkets like Asda,Hillards and Sainsburys in Huddersfield (11km away)but some people go to Holmfirth. Huddersfield is the main place where people buy their clothes although some people buy them from Holmfirth.Quite a few people make their own clothes.Most people buy their electrical goods from electrical chain stores in Huddersfield.A few buy them from Holmfirth or Leeds (20km ).Some people find it easier and cheaper to shop at the village shop.
